attributes.action: to condemn the massacre of 613 innocent civilians in Khojaly on 26th February 1992, and to urge the Armenian government to comply with UN Security Council Resolutions 822, 853, 874, 884
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: 'On the 26th February Azerbaijan mourns one of the darkest days in its history. On this day in 1992 Armenian military forces brutally murdered civilian inhabitants of the town of Khojaly in the illegally occupied region of Nagorno-Karabakh. The day of Khojaly is not only a day to mourn the dead, but a reminder of the Armenian aggression that continues to this day. The world media condemned these atrocities, with the UK's own Times newspaper remarking how 'the refugees had been shot down as they ran.' 18 years after this fateful day we remember those who died that day in the face of an illegal occupation that still claims almost 20% of Azerbaijan's sovereign territory.'
